    <section class="description">
     <div class="message-the-recruiter">
      <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Merkle EMEA</p>
      <div class="base-main-card">
       <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQF-tu76D5tJMw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=L60rDxdgp733UyqmWM0pDGDO-3oM5v7HNEUgcmrtfug" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Manuel Arturo">
       <div class="base-main-card__info">
        <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Manuel Arturo</h3>
        <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">The right job can transform a person's life, and the right person can transform a business. That's Recruiting Magic!</h4>
       </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Manuel Arturo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fmanu-arturo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
        <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
        <p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
         <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
         <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
         <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
         <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
         <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
         <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p><strong>What weâ€™re looking for</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>Youâ€™re a recent graduate and hold an IT-related university degree (Bachelor or Master) </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re interested in creating good quality software </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re interested in an agile environment </li>
         <li>Youâ€™ve got intellectual curiosity and ambition </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re a great team player but are also able to work autonomously </li>
         <li>Good English is essential as most of our communication takes place in English </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re an EU citizen or have an EU work permit </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re able and willing to occasionally travel to client sites or other Merkle offices throughout Europe </li>
        </ul>
        <p><strong><br></strong> </p>
        <p><strong>Salary and benefits</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>Attractive and competitive salary </li>
         <li>Spanish/English lessons and free coffee and fruit </li>
         <li>Free life and health insurance </li>
         <li>Great career progression opportunities </li>
         <li>Opportunities for personal growth &amp; professional development </li>
         <li>Career development through Merkle University (which includes access to Linkedin Learning and Skillsoft) </li>
         <li>Merkle Benefits Club </li>
         <li>Great friendly and international environment </li>
        </ul>
        <p><em><br></em> </p>
        <p><em>Merkle does not discriminate against job applicants on the basis of age, disability, gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity, race, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Experience stipulated in this job description serves as a guide only and all applications will be considered on their merits, irrespective of experience. At the point of application, the candidate must have the legal right to work in Spain as we are unable to sponsor visas at this time.</em> </p>
        <p><em><br></em> </p>
        <p><em>As part of our Diversity and Inclusion agenda, and as an Equal Opportunities employer, if you require reasonable adjustments during the selection process please engage directly with your Recruiter.</em></p>

        <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
        <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>

     <div class="face-pile">

         <p class="create-alert-form__agreement-links">Al crear esta alerta de empleo, aceptas las <a class="create-alert-form__agreement-item-link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement?trk=public_jobs_create-alert-modal_create-alert-form_user-agreement" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_create-alert-modal_create-alert-form_user-agreement" data-tracking-will-navigate>Condiciones de uso</a> y la <a class="create-alert-form__agreement-item-link" href="https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy?trk=public_jobs_create-alert-modal_create-alert-form_privacy-policy" target="_blank" rel="noopener" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_create-alert-modal_create-alert-form_privacy-policy" data-tracking-will-navigate>PolÃ­tica de privacidad</a>. Puedes darte de baja de estos emails en cualquier momento.</p><code id="i18n_create_alert_invalid_email" style="display: none;"><!--"Introduce una direcciÃ³n de email vÃ¡lida"--></code><code id="i18n_generic_error_message" style="display: none;"><!--"No se ha podido crear la alerta de empleo.      </div>
    </section>
    <section class="description">
     <div class="message-the-recruiter">
      <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Merkle EMEA</p>
      <div class="base-main-card">
       <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQF-tu76D5tJMw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=L60rDxdgp733UyqmWM0pDGDO-3oM5v7HNEUgcmrtfug" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Manuel Arturo">
       <div class="base-main-card__info">
        <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Manuel Arturo</h3>
        <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">The right job can transform a person's life, and the right person can transform a business. That's Recruiting Magic!</h4>
       </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Manuel Arturo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fmanu-arturo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
        <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
        <p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
         <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
         <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
         <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
         <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
         <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
         <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
        </ul>
        <p><br> </p>
        <p><strong>What weâ€™re looking for</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>Youâ€™re a recent graduate and hold an IT-related university degree (Bachelor or Master) </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re interested in creating good quality software </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re interested in an agile environment </li>
         <li>Youâ€™ve got intellectual curiosity and ambition </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re a great team player but are also able to work autonomously </li>
         <li>Good English is essential as most of our communication takes place in English </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re an EU citizen or have an EU work permit </li>
         <li>Youâ€™re able and willing to occasionally travel to client sites or other Merkle offices throughout Europe </li>
        </ul>
        <p><strong><br></strong> </p>
        <p><strong>Salary and benefits</strong> </p>
        <ul>
         <li>Attractive and competitive salary </li>
         <li>Spanish/English lessons and free coffee and fruit </li>
         <li>Free life and health insurance </li>
         <li>Great career progression opportunities </li>
         <li>Opportunities for personal growth &amp; professional development </li>
         <li>Career development through Merkle University (which includes access to Linkedin Learning and Skillsoft) </li>
         <li>Merkle Benefits Club </li>
         <li>Great friendly and international environment </li>
        </ul>
        <p><em><br></em> </p>
        <p><em>Merkle does not discriminate against job applicants on the basis of age, disability, gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity, race, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Experience stipulated in this job description serves as a guide only and all applications will be considered on their merits, irrespective of experience. At the point of application, the candidate must have the legal right to work in Spain as we are unable to sponsor visas at this time.</em> </p>
        <p><em><br></em> </p>
        <p><em>As part of our Diversity and Inclusion agenda, and as an Equal Opportunities employer, if you require reasonable adjustments during the selection process please engage directly with your Recruiter.</em></p>

   <section class="description">
    <div class="message-the-recruiter">
     <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Merkle EMEA</p>
     <div class="base-main-card">
      <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQF-tu76D5tJMw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=L60rDxdgp733UyqmWM0pDGDO-3oM5v7HNEUgcmrtfug" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Manuel Arturo">
      <div class="base-main-card__info">
       <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Manuel Arturo</h3>
       <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">The right job can transform a person's life, and the right person can transform a business. That's Recruiting Magic!</h4>
      </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Manuel Arturo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fmanu-arturo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
       <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
     <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
      <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
       <p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
       <p><br> </p>
       <p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
       <p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
       <p><br> </p>
       <p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
       <p><br> </p>
       <p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
       <p><br> </p>
       <p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
       <ul>
        <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
        <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
        <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
        <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
       </ul>
       <p><br> </p>
       <p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
       <ul>
        <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
        <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
        <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
        <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
       </ul>
       <p><br> </p>
       <p><strong>What weâ€™re looking for</strong> </p>
       <ul>
        <li>Youâ€™re a recent graduate and hold an IT-related university degree (Bachelor or Master) </li>
        <li>Youâ€™re interested in creating good quality software </li>
        <li>Youâ€™re interested in an agile environment </li>
        <li>Youâ€™ve got intellectual curiosity and ambition </li>
        <li>Youâ€™re a great team player but are also able to work autonomously </li>
        <li>Good English is essential as most of our communication takes place in English </li>
        <li>Youâ€™re an EU citizen or have an EU work permit </li>
        <li>Youâ€™re able and willing to occasionally travel to client sites or other Merkle offices throughout Europe </li>
       </ul>
       <p><strong><br></strong> </p>
       <p><strong>Salary and benefits</strong> </p>
       <ul>
        <li>Attractive and competitive salary </li>
        <li>Spanish/English lessons and free coffee and fruit </li>
        <li>Free life and health insurance </li>
        <li>Great career progression opportunities </li>
        <li>Opportunities for personal growth &amp; professional development </li>
        <li>Career development through Merkle University (which includes access to Linkedin Learning and Skillsoft) </li>
        <li>Merkle Benefits Club </li>
        <li>Great friendly and international environment </li>
       </ul>
       <p><em><br></em> </p>
       <p><em>Merkle does not discriminate against job applicants on the basis of age, disability, gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity, race, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Experience stipulated in this job description serves as a guide only and all applications will be considered on their merits, irrespective of experience. At the point of application, the candidate must have the legal right to work in Spain as we are unable to sponsor visas at this time.</em> </p>
       <p><em><br></em> </p>
       <p><em>As part of our Diversity and Inclusion agenda, and as an Equal Opportunities employer, if you require reasonable adjustments during the selection process please engage directly with your Recruiter.</em></p>

       <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos

  <section class="description">
   <div class="message-the-recruiter">
    <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Merkle EMEA</p>
    <div class="base-main-card">
     <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQF-tu76D5tJMw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=L60rDxdgp733UyqmWM0pDGDO-3oM5v7HNEUgcmrtfug" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Manuel Arturo">
     <div class="base-main-card__info">
      <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Manuel Arturo</h3>
      <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">The right job can transform a person's life, and the right person can transform a business. That's Recruiting Magic!</h4>
     </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Manuel Arturo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fmanu-arturo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
      <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
    <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
     <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
      <p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
      <p><br> </p>
      <p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
      <p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
      <p><br> </p>
      <p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
      <p><br> </p>
      <p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
      <p><br> </p>
      <p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
      <ul>
       <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
       <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
       <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
       <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
      </ul>
      <p><br> </p>
      <p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
      <ul>
       <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
       <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
       <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
       <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
      </ul>
      <p><br> </p>
      <p><strong>What weâ€™re looking for</strong> </p>
      <ul>
       <li>Youâ€™re a recent graduate and hold an IT-related university degree (Bachelor or Master) </li>
       <li>Youâ€™re interested in creating good quality software </li>
       <li>Youâ€™re interested in an agile environment </li>
       <li>Youâ€™ve got intellectual curiosity and ambition </li>
       <li>Youâ€™re a great team player but are also able to work autonomously </li>
       <li>Good English is essential as most of our communication takes place in English </li>
       <li>Youâ€™re an EU citizen or have an EU work permit </li>
       <li>Youâ€™re able and willing to occasionally travel to client sites or other Merkle offices throughout Europe </li>
      </ul>
      <p><strong><br></strong> </p>
      <p><strong>Salary and benefits</strong> </p>
      <ul>
       <li>Attractive and competitive salary </li>
       <li>Spanish/English lessons and free coffee and fruit </li>
       <li>Free life and health insurance </li>
       <li>Great career progression opportunities </li>
       <li>Opportunities for personal growth &amp; professional development </li>
       <li>Career development through Merkle University (which includes access to Linkedin Learning and Skillsoft) </li>
       <li>Merkle Benefits Club </li>
       <li>Great friendly and international environment </li>
      </ul>
      <p><em><br></em> </p>
      <p><em>Merkle does not discriminate against job applicants on the basis of age, disability, gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity, race, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Experience stipulated in this job description serves as a guide only and all applications will be considered on their merits, irrespective of experience. At the point of application, the candidate must have the legal right to work in Spain as we are unable to sponsor visas at this time.</em> </p>
      <p><em><br></em> </p>
      <p><em>As part of our Diversity and Inclusion agenda, and as an Equal Opportunities employer, if you require reasonable adjustments during the selection process please engage directly with your Recruiter.</em></p>

      <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos

   <a class="topcard__logo-container" href="https://uk.linkedin.com/company/merkle-emea?trk=public_jobs_topcard_logo" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_topcard_logo" data-tracking-will-navigate><img class="company-logo company-logo--small lazy-load company-logo--inline-topcard" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFE3EaFkQXkxw/company-logo_100_100/0?e=1614211200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=H85fCFJbg7oyNNr5o7gBFeVsWzIFKr3XiOPYMsihzO4" alt="Merkle EMEA"></a>
   <div class="topcard__content-left">
    <h1 class="topcard__title">Junior Java Developer</h1>
    <h3 class="topcard__flavor-row"><span class="topcard__flavor"><a class="topcard__org-name-link topcard__flavor--black-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="https://uk.linkedin.com/company/merkle-emea?trk=public_jobs_topcard_org_name" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_topcard_org_name" data-tracking-will-navigate>Merkle EMEA</a></span><span class="topcard__flavor topcard__flavor--bullet">Barcelona</span></h3>
    <h3 class="topcard__flavor-row"><span class="topcard__flavor--metadata posted-time-ago__text">Hace 5 dÃ­as</span><span class="topcard__flavor--metadata topcard__flavor--bullet num-applicants__caption">99Â&nbsp;solicitudes</span></h3>
    <div class="see-who-was-hired">
     <div class="see-who-was-hired__image-container">

 <section class="description">
  <div class="message-the-recruiter">
   <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Merkle EMEA</p>
   <div class="base-main-card">
    <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQF-tu76D5tJMw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=L60rDxdgp733UyqmWM0pDGDO-3oM5v7HNEUgcmrtfug" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Manuel Arturo">
    <div class="base-main-card__info">
     <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Manuel Arturo</h3>
     <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">The right job can transform a person's life, and the right person can transform a business. That's Recruiting Magic!</h4>
    </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Manuel Arturo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fmanu-arturo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
     <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
   <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
    <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
     <p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
     <p><br> </p>
     <p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
     <p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
     <p><br> </p>
     <p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
     <p><br> </p>
     <p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
     <p><br> </p>
     <p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
     <ul>
      <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
      <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
      <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
      <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
     </ul>
     <p><br> </p>
     <p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
     <ul>
      <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
      <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
      <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
      <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
     </ul>
     <p><br> </p>
     <p><strong>What weâ€™re looking for</strong> </p>
     <ul>
      <li>Youâ€™re a recent graduate and hold an IT-related university degree (Bachelor or Master) </li>
      <li>Youâ€™re interested in creating good quality software </li>
      <li>Youâ€™re interested in an agile environment </li>
      <li>Youâ€™ve got intellectual curiosity and ambition </li>
      <li>Youâ€™re a great team player but are also able to work autonomously </li>
      <li>Good English is essential as most of our communication takes place in English </li>
      <li>Youâ€™re an EU citizen or have an EU work permit </li>
      <li>Youâ€™re able and willing to occasionally travel to client sites or other Merkle offices throughout Europe </li>
     </ul>
     <p><strong><br></strong> </p>
     <p><strong>Salary and benefits</strong> </p>
     <ul>
      <li>Attractive and competitive salary </li>
      <li>Spanish/English lessons and free coffee and fruit </li>
      <li>Free life and health insurance </li>
      <li>Great career progression opportunities </li>
      <li>Opportunities for personal growth &amp; professional development </li>
      <li>Career development through Merkle University (which includes access to Linkedin Learning and Skillsoft) </li>
      <li>Merkle Benefits Club </li>
      <li>Great friendly and international environment </li>
     </ul>
     <p><em><br></em> </p>
     <p><em>Merkle does not discriminate against job applicants on the basis of age, disability, gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity, race, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Experience stipulated in this job description serves as a guide only and all applications will be considered on their merits, irrespective of experience. At the point of application, the candidate must have the legal right to work in Spain as we are unable to sponsor visas at this time.</em> </p>
     <p><em><br></em> </p>
     <p><em>As part of our Diversity and Inclusion agenda, and as an Equal Opportunities employer, if you require reasonable adjustments during the selection process please engage directly with your Recruiter.</em></p>

     <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos

   </section>

<section class="description">
 <div class="message-the-recruiter">
  <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Merkle EMEA</p>
  <div class="base-main-card">
   <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQF-tu76D5tJMw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=L60rDxdgp733UyqmWM0pDGDO-3oM5v7HNEUgcmrtfug" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="Manuel Arturo">
   <div class="base-main-card__info">
    <h3 class="base-main-card__title">Manuel Arturo</h3>
    <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">The right job can transform a person's life, and the right person can transform a business. That's Recruiting Magic!</h4>
   </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Manuel Arturo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fmanu-arturo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
    <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp1.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
  </div>
 </div>
 <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
  <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
   <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
    <p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
    <p><br> </p>
    <p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
    <p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
    <p><br> </p>
    <p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
    <p><br> </p>
    <p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
    <p><br> </p>
    <p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
    <ul>
     <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
     <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
     <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
     <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
    </ul>
    <p><br> </p>
    <p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
    <ul>
     <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
     <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
     <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
     <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
    </ul>
    <p><br> </p>
    <p><strong>What weâ€™re looking for</strong> </p>
    <ul>
     <li>Youâ€™re a recent graduate and hold an IT-related university degree (Bachelor or Master) </li>
     <li>Youâ€™re interested in creating good quality software </li>
     <li>Youâ€™re interested in an agile environment </li>
     <li>Youâ€™ve got intellectual curiosity and ambition </li>
     <li>Youâ€™re a great team player but are also able to work autonomously </li>
     <li>Good English is essential as most of our communication takes place in English </li>
     <li>Youâ€™re an EU citizen or have an EU work permit </li>
     <li>Youâ€™re able and willing to occasionally travel to client sites or other Merkle offices throughout Europe </li>
    </ul>
    <p><strong><br></strong> </p>
    <p><strong>Salary and benefits</strong> </p>
    <ul>
     <li>Attractive and competitive salary </li>
     <li>Spanish/English lessons and free coffee and fruit </li>
     <li>Free life and health insurance </li>
     <li>Great career progression opportunities </li>
     <li>Opportunities for personal growth &amp; professional development </li>
     <li>Career development through Merkle University (which includes access to Linkedin Learning and Skillsoft) </li>
     <li>Merkle Benefits Club </li>
     <li>Great friendly and international environment </li>
    </ul>
    <p><em><br></em> </p>
    <p><em>Merkle does not discriminate against job applicants on the basis of age, disability, gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity, race, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origin, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Experience stipulated in this job description serves as a guide only and all applications will be considered on their merits, irrespective of experience. At the point of application, the candidate must have the legal right to work in Spain as we are unable to sponsor visas at this time.</em> </p>
    <p><em><br></em> </p>
    <p><em>As part of our Diversity and Inclusion agenda, and as an Equal Opportunities employer, if you require reasonable adjustments during the selection process please engage directly with your Recruiter.</em></p>

<h3 class="base-main-card__title">Manuel Arturo</h3>
<h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">The right job can transform a person's life, and the right person can transform a business. That's Recruiting Magic!</h4>
<a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a Manuel Arturo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fmanu-arturo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>

<div class="description__text description__text--rich">
 <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
  <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
   <p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
   <p><br> </p>
   <p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
   <p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
   <p><br> </p>
   <p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
   <p><br> </p>
   <p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
   <p><br> </p>
   <p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
   <ul>
    <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
    <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
    <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
    <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
   </ul>
   <p><br> </p>
   <p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
   <ul>
    <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
    <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
    <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
    <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
   </ul>
   <p><br> </p>
   <p><strong>What weâ€™re looking for</strong> </p>
   <ul>
    <li>Youâ€™re a recent graduate and hold an IT-related university degree (Bachelor or Master) </li>
    <li>Youâ€™re interested in creating good quality software </li>
    <li>Youâ€™re interested in an agile environment </li>
    <li>Youâ€™ve got intellectual curiosity and ambition </li>
    <li>Youâ€™re a great team player but are also able to work autonomously </li>
    <li>Good English is essential as most of our communication takes place in English </li>
    <li>Youâ€™re an EU citizen or have an EU work permit </li>
    <li>Youâ€™re able and willing to occasionally travel to client sites or other Merkle offices throughout Europe </li>
   </ul>
   <p><strong><br></strong> </p>
   <p><strong>Salary and benefits</strong> </p>
   <ul>
    <li>Attractive and competitive salary </li>
    <li>Spanish/English lessons and free coffee and fruit </li>
    <li>Free life and health insurance </li>
    <li>Great career progression opportunities </li>
    <li>Opportunities for personal growth &amp; professional development </li>
    <li>Career development through Merkle University (which includes access to Linkedin Learning and Skillsoft) </li>
    <li>Merkle Benefits Club </li>
    <li>Great friendly and international environment </li>

</div>
<p>Come be a part of our professional, collaborative, and fun work environment, where everyone gets to make a difference. Weâ€™re looking for ambitious and enthusiastic individuals that have recently graduated in Computing Engineering or similar and are looking to start their career as Java Developers. </p>
<p><br> </p>
<br>
<p>As a Java Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional development team using agile methodologies. Here at Merkle Barcelona, we take agile very seriously: we started to work using Scrum 6 years ago so we have plenty of experience implementing it with excellent results </p>
<p>So not only you will learn programming best practise but also will learn agile methodologies and the values and behaviours needed to create high performance teams. </p>
<p><br> </p>
<br>
<p>As part of a development team, you will also be responsible for making sure that all software that our projects deliver is of the highest possible quality, that includes interaction with senior developers, QA and designers </p>
<p><br> </p>
<br>
<p>As part of our Java Graduate Scheme, weâ€™ll give you all the training and mentoring needed to become a full-stack Java Developer, learning both frontend and backend technologies. Weâ€™ll do this using both formal and on-the-job training, shadowing other Developers working on a variety of projects. The aim is before two years to become a fully-fledged Full stack Java Consultant, but chances are you achieve this much sooner. Full support and guidance are given by your line manager and our HR team. </p>
<p><br> </p>
<br>
<p><strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong> </p>
<strong>As a Java trainee you will:</strong>
<ul>
 <li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
 <li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
 <li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
 <li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
</ul>
<li>Be part of a Scrum development team in Barcelona, so you will not only learn about Scrum framework but also the behaviours and values that make a great team </li>
<li>Work with senior developers, so you will learn a lot! </li>
<li>Be responsible to develop software (both backend and frontend) </li>
<li>Interact with QA in the teams to make sure everybody understands what we have to deliver and that all new functionality is covered with tests </li>
<p><br> </p>
<br>
<p><strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong> </p>
<strong>Life at the Merkle Java Graduate Scheme</strong>
<ul>
 <li>We have a fantastic training and mentoring programme in place to help you get up to speed with what we do, learn how everything works, and to prepare you to be an exceptional Java developer </li>
 <li>You will be directly working with a portfolio of international clients in a wide range of sectors </li>
 <li>During the graduate programme you will have the opportunity to see different types of Java development projects </li>
 <li>We will regularly evaluate your performance and adjust training needs as necessary </li>
</ul>
